# disableEditing()

**Instance Method**

Disables editing when it’s unsafe to make changes to a document.

## Declaration

```swift
func disableEditing()
```

## Discussion

Subclasses should override this method to prevent the user from editing the document when it’s unsafe to do so, such as during a save-and-close or revert operation. When editing is safe again, UIKit class calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/enableEditing()]. The default implementation of this method does nothing.

## Disabling and enabling editing

- **enableEditing()**: Enables editing when it’s safe again to make changes to a document.
